ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Goodbye
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Does this guy read the same posts I do?  Bye, I guess. Matt Honig Wayfarer 57 Ranger Cazic Thule
ygData.messageBody:
Thunder Cat wrote:
> I am posting to tell Su that this is AGAIN my last post. I left this
> group once before because of idiotic members who insisted on forcing
> their opinions apon others, and I will not put up with it. I have
> better things to do with my time then spend it with opinionated low
> lifes. Su, I'm sorry for everything, none of this goes to you, I know
> you tired, but there are just too many morons to filter out of the
> group. To the rest of you, you will never get anywhere in life with
> the attitudes you have. Only in a fantasy game like EverQuest will
> you ever be something. But at some point you need to grow up and face
> reality, and it's not going to be fun or easy when you do. Do not
> bother replying to this post. Leave your fights and comments out of
> Su's group and for once in your life respect her wishes and be
> CONSIDERATE. If you forgot what that word means, get a dictionary. If
> you MUST comment, e-mail me personally, but I most likely will just
> delete the message. Like I said, I have better things to do. Good
> day.
>
> -= Mippon - Level 40 Halfling Druid =-

Does this guy read the same posts I do?

<shrug>

Bye, I guess.

Matt

Honig Wayfarer
57 Ranger
Cazic Thule
